visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly temperature data with a custom color scheme. Additional configurations include setting chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9) with specific margins for top and bottom. The title of the chart is styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 20px. The x-axis and y-axis labels are styled with a medium gray color and a font size of 12px, while their titles are styled with a slightly darker gray color and a font size of 14px. The data series represents monthly temperature data with a custom color of tomato red (#FF6347). The legend is enabled and styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 12px.
